title: Fujifilm QuickSnap Flash 400 One-Time-Use Camera - 2 Pack
description: What fun will you develop? The FUJIFILM QuickSnap Flash 400 one-time-use camera is fun and easy to use – great for taking pictures indoors or outdoors! It sports a compact body and is pre-loaded with ISO 400 speed film that produces very sharp pictures. It features a built-in flash with a 10’ flash range and a continuous flash switch. This makes it super easy to take multiple shots, letting you focus on the fun of taking the pictures!
Continuous flash automatically recharges for your next picture
Continuous flash automatically recharges for your next picture
Fixed-focus lens for sharp, clear pictures
Fixed-focus lens for sharp, clear pictures
Compact and easy to use  In keeping with Fujifilm's commitment with environmental conservation, all Fujicolor QuickSnap cameras are recyclable.
In keeping with Fujifilm's commitment with environmental conservation, all Fujicolor QuickSnap cameras are recyclable.
